title: too much lag
body:
Recently there is too much lag.. Can you pleas provide us the server ID, so that I can check my ping.
In game it is showing 167 ping. Which is fine from my end because I had already played  with 200 ping.

Now this 167 ping is fells like 400 ping.

I need the server ID so that I can check the ping with cmd.

replies.body: You can obtain your traceroute by downloading [WINMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/), and using 192.64.170.252 as your destination.  As a first step though, I suggest instead running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) in case there are other or local issues.  The reader will yield results about your increased ping, as well as instructions specific to your case for a resolution.  Hopefully, that should get you back in game without issue!
